title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, cook guanciale in a skillet until crisp. Remove from skillet and set aside.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, cheese, and pepper.
Drain pasta and immediately add to the skillet with a little pasta water.
Remove skillet from heat, add egg mixture and guanciale, and toss quickly until a creamy sauce forms. Serve immediately.
